subject: p16662264
Findings: Cardiomediastinal silhouette and hilar contours are unremarkable. Residual hazy opacities persist at bilateral lung bases and inferior lingula from prior recent infection but are significantly improved from prior study. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. There is no new focal consolidation. The osseous structures are grossly unremarkable.
Impression: Hazy bibasilar opacities, likely the residua from recent prior infection greatly improved in appearance. No new focal consolidation.
